title: The Dark River Secret
description: Who do you trust? Astrid Ingebritson leaves her Vancouver Island home for a fresh start in northern British Columbia. She begins a promising romance and it appears the move was what the doctor ordered. But what seems like a serendipitous opportunity to become a live-in caregiver to a vulnerable woman on a remote ranch takes a sinister turn when Astrid stumbles across a long-hidden secret and triggers a dangerous chain of events. The hunt is on. The trap is closing. A serial killer has her in his sights.
author: Gayle Siebert
